TwitchBits.label: Subscribe to and send Twitch Bits events

TwitchSub.label: Subscribe to and send Twitch Subscription events

TwitchChannelPoints.label: Subscribe to and send Twitch Channel Point Rewards events

JTVClientID.label: Twitch Client ID
JTVClientID.tooltip: The Twitch Client ID found at https://dev.twitch.tv/console/apps

JTVToken.label: Twitch Oauth Token
JTVToken.tooltip: The Twitch Oauth Token that can be generated at https://twitchapps.com/tokengen. For correct scopes, see https://dev.twitch.tv/docs/authentication#scopes
